about_the_game:
Project DE is a multiplayer action game that combines asymmetric escape survival with high-quality pixel art.

In a city haunted by abnormal phenomena, you must play as investigators with various abilities to fight against monsters, find trophies and escape through the intervention of other players.

Battle

  • Team up with up to 2 players and explore the city. Of course, it is also possible to venture alone.

  • You must use various character combinations to effectively respond to various given situations.

  • Use powerful and special consumable items to overcome the crisis.

Exploration

  • Get your hands on magical and/or sci-fi weapons that can help you fight against monsters in the city.

  • Retrieve the valuables you were asked to retrieve from the abnormal space and escape safely.

  • Explore various maps engulfed in strange anomalies.

Survival

  • Face various dangers such as otherworldly monsters, grotesque phenomena, and runaway mecha.

  • Use the various devices remaining in the evacuated city to increase your survival chances.

  • Obtain an arcane seal to get strengthening effects to respond to rapidly changing situations.

Progress

  • Develop various characters with unique occupations such as Front, Shooter, Mystic, and Supporter.

  • Set up various equipment to maximize your character’s abilities.

  • Customize your character’s skill tree according to your desired play-style.

Manage

  • Run an antique cafe that attracts special customers in a city where strange phenomena have become a daily routine.

  • Assist investigators exploring abnormal spaces and help them escape safely.

  • Broker requests from customers looking for items that can only be found in the abnormal space and acquire benefits.

About Project DE

Project DE is being developed by a small team passionate about various co-op multiplayer games, dungeon crawlers, and loot shooters. If you enjoyed Project Zomboid, Risk of Rain, the Diablo series, the Mystery Dungeon series, or the Darkest Dungeon series, Project DE will offer you a unique and fresh take on the dungeon crawler genre, set in a cosmic horror urban fantasy world.

name: Project DE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470 / Intel® Arc™ A750 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Project DE combines extraction game style and pixel art to create a new action experience. Explore a city surrounded by anomalies, overcome monsters and ohter rival players, to collect your trophies. Take on this Co-Op multiplayer with your friends to find the rewards and escape.
